name: Atom-X
description:
Atom-X is a first-person shooter, in which you play a robot that is suddenly activated. You don't know where you are, or why you reactivated. However, you must fight against enemies whohave only one goal : to eliminate you by all means.

Your objective : Explore the map to find more and more powerful equipment and weapons to survive as long as possible...

discover a fully prodecurally generated map, so you can explore new places in every game, gain experience to unlock more and more content as you play, and fight against ever more fierces enemies !
